General.Name: Beijing Tiantan Biological Products Corp Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Tiantan Biological Products Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, sale, and consulting of blood products in China. Its products include human albumin; intravenous human immunoglobulin; tetanus human immunoglobulin; rabies patient immunoglobulin; hepatitis B human immunoglobulin; freeze-dried intravenous hepatitis B human immunoglobulin; and human prothrombin complex blood products. The company was founded in 1919 and is headquartered in Beijing, China. Beijing Tiantan Biological Products Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of China National Biotec Group Company Limited.
